title: A SYSTEM FOR HANDLING OF LIQUIDS
abstract: A device (1, 10, 11, 12, 13) for storing and delivering liquids comprising a watertight bag (2, 102, 112, 122, 132) having at least one opening (3, 103, 113, 123, 133) and a delivery system (5, 6, 7, 8) operatively connected to said opening; the device further comprises a first (20, 60) and a second (30, 70) stiff surfaces connected by flexible flanks (40, 50, 80, 90). The delivery system comprises a connection locking device (200) for connecting the fluid-carrying pipes and fitting system, which comprises a spigot (201) inserted in the collar (501) of a hose (51), an external compression ring (202) positioned onto the portion of the collar (501) which is covering the spigot and a conical threaded sleeve (203) locking said external compression ring (202) onto said portion of the collar covering the spigot.

motivations: There is a need for an efficient and reliable system for storing and delivering liquids.
objectives: Design a device for storing and delivering liquids that is watertight and has a secure delivery system.
methods: Develop a device with a watertight bag and a delivery system connected to an opening in the bag.
Use stiff surfaces connected by flexible flanks to provide structural support to the device.
Implement a connection locking device to secure fluid-carrying pipes and fittings.
results: Provide a reliable and efficient system for handling liquids.

motivations: There is a need for an efficient system for storing and delivering liquids.
objectives: Design a device for storing and delivering liquids that includes a watertight bag and a delivery system.
Incorporate a connection locking device in the delivery system for connecting fluid-carrying pipes and fitting system.
methods: Use a watertight bag with at least one opening and a delivery system operatively connected to the opening.
Implement a connection locking device in the delivery system, which includes a spigot, an external compression ring, and a conical threaded sleeve.
results: Develop a device that can efficiently store and deliver liquids.
Improve the connection of fluid-carrying pipes and fitting system with the help of a connection locking device.

motivations: Traditional liquid storage and delivery systems lack efficient and secure connection mechanisms for fluid-carrying pipes.
There is a need for improved watertight storage solutions with reliable delivery systems for handling liquids.
objectives: Develop a device for storing and delivering liquids with enhanced watertight properties and secure connection mechanisms.
Create a reliable locking system for connecting fluid-carrying pipes and fittings in liquid handling applications.
methods: Design a watertight bag with stiff surfaces connected by flexible flanks for liquid storage.
Implement a connection locking device using a spigot, external compression ring, and conical threaded sleeve configuration.
results: Improved security and reliability in liquid storage and delivery through enhanced connection mechanisms.
Prevention of leaks and disconnections in fluid-carrying pipe systems.
anthropic_json.research_subject: Liquid storage and delivery system with secure pipe connection mechanism
